mechouia.name: Slata Mechouia
mechouia.description: Traditional grilled vegetable salad with roasted peppers, tomatoes, and garlic
mechouia.details: Served with boiled eggs, premium tuna, and Kalamata olives

brik.name: Traditional Egg Brik
brik.description: Crispy malsouka pastry filled with egg and fresh parsley
brik.details: Served with lemon wedges and homemade harissa sauce

couscous.name: Seafood Couscous
couscous.description: Fine couscous with fresh seafood and seasonal vegetables
couscous.details: Prepared with daily catch and traditional tfaya sauce

ojja.name: Merguez Ojja
ojja.description: Spicy tomato stew with poached eggs and authentic merguez sausage
ojja.details: Served in a traditional clay tagine

zriga.name: Zriga
zriga.description: Traditional sorghum milk cream delicately flavored with rose water
zriga.details: Garnished with premium nuts and local honey

kaak.name: Kaak Warka
kaak.details: Crafted following an authentic Tunisian recipe
